음식 맛있다고 유명한 호텔이라 기대 많이 하고 갔는데 역시나 솜씨가 좋고 입맛에 잘 맞았어요! 가짓수가 많은 편은 아니지만 모든 메뉴가 맛이 좋았습니다 수영장은 워낙 유명하니 제 후기가 필요 없지만 확실한건 사진보다 넓고 성인들이 놀기에 아쉽지않은 깊이와 크기 였습니다! 온수풀에, 야외 노천탕도 있어 겨울에도 너무 잘 즐기고 왔습니다', '조식도 마음에 들었고 시설도 좋았어요. 서울에 갈때 또 예약할것같아요', '친구랑 호캉스로 다녀왔는데 조식이야 전 호텔 중에 여기 제일 좋아해서 좋았구요 ㅎㅎ 나머지도 다 즐거웠습니다-!', '커플 이용객에게 아주 좋은 선택이 될 것 같습니다.', '가격대비 괜찮았음', '합리적인 가격에 서비스도 좋고 자주 이용합니다.', '수영장 괜찮고, 조식도 좋아요. 추천합니다', '깔끔하고 편안하게 쉬고 왔습니다', '뷰도 좋고 라운지 음식도 좋고 애프터눈 티만 무난하고 모두 최고였어요 커플끼리 가기도 넘 좋아요', '해피아워에 핫푸드가 많아서 따로 저녁 안먹고 라운지에서 저녁겸 술마시기 좋아요 조식도 괜찮았어요 먹캉스하기 가성비 좋고 사람없을 때 가서그런지 여유롭고 번잡하지않았어요', '야간 고궁 투어가 있어 숙소를 가까운 곳으로 잡았는데 정말 모든 것에 만족했습니다. 정말 최고입니다.', '날씨가 쌀쌀했는데도 불구하고 수영장 수온이 따뜻해서 춥지않게 즐길 수 있었어요. 특히 조식의 음식 종류가 많아서 좋았습니다. 직원 분들이 친절하셔서 편하게 쉬다 갑니다.', '체크인후 바로 방에 들어가니 실내온도 30도이구 쉽게 방온도를 조절할수 있는 시스템은 아닌거 같습니다. 덥고 건조했습니다. 주차장 가깝고 도로 근처 위치 좋았습니다. 조식도 괜찮습니다.', '풀사이드 스위트에서 묵었어요, 방문열면 바로 풀이 있어서 이용하기 너무 편했고, 24시간 개인 자쿠지가 있어서 언제든 사용할수 있어서 좋았습니다. 라운지에서 파는 카이막빙수와 커피가 정말 맛있어요!', '밥이 맛있음', '수영장 이용 안하고 온게 아쉽지만 서울 도심 한복판에 있는 꿀잠 잘 수 있는 침대가 있는 호텔 아주 좋았습니다. 다음엔 꼭 외부 수영장 이용해보고싶어요. 카이막 빙수 색다른 경험이었어요 너무 좋았답니다!!', '모든것이 너무 좋았던 앰버서더에서의 아들과 호캉스...직원분들도 친절하시고 조식도 너무 맛있었어요. 단지 지하1층 실내 수영장에 락커키를 지하2층에 가서 받아와야하는데 따로 그런 안내나 문구조차 없어서 그점이 실망이었습니다. 조금만 더 세심했으면 최고의 호텔이 될것입니다.', '저녁 늦게 체크인을 해야해서 저녁 즈음 주변 편의점을 물색했는데.. 가기가 어려웠던 점이 아쉬웠어요 호텔 내부에라도 한군데 있으면 좋겠어요 조식은 앉을 곳 넉넉해서 좋았고 직원들 응대도 좋았어요', '남산타워 뷰도 멋있어요.', '굿굿굿', '이그제큐티브 룸은 가성비 최고라고 생각합니다', '적당히 나쁘지않은정도', '객실 깨끗하고 이그젝큐티브 라운지 분위기 고급지고 좋았어요.자리가 좀 떨어져 있고 음식도 괜찮았어요.하루 먹고 쉬기에 좋아요.', '처음으로 5성급 호텔을 이용했는데 에프터눈티도 맛이 훌륭했고 룸 컨디션이나 침대와 침구도 아주 훌륭했습니다! Most of the staff I encountered was young and thus didn’t have a very skillful vibe but was very kind.', '수영장은 그렇게 크지는않는데 다른 서비스가 아주 좋습니다', '깔끔하고 수영장 이쁘고 레스토랑 직원분들도 친절해서 애인과 좋은시간 보냈습니다', '수영장과 객실이 바로 연결되어 이용하기 편리했고, 식음업장도 조식 및 풀테라스 음식도 가격도 합리적이고 음식도 훌륭했습니다. 서울 시내에 위치하여 접근성도 좋았습니다.', '깨끗하고, 뷔페/해피아워/조식 모두 훌륭했어요. 특히 직원분들이 너무너무 친절하셔서 이용하는 내내 기분이 좋았습니다! (특히 18층 라운지 직원분들 ㅎㅎ)', '앰배서더 서울 풀만 호텔에서 더운 여름 멋진 호캉스를 보냈습니다.', '좋습니다 뭐 이이상 설명 노필요', '친구랑 늦은 호캉스 보냈는데 수영장도 이뿌고 룸도 맘에 들었어요', '좀 빈약하네요 그것 말고는 다 만족스러운 여행이 될수있게 해주는 호텔인거 같습니다', '유아 동반으로 호텔 수영장을 이용하려고 예약했는데 일정상 숙박과 조식만 사용했어요. 하지만 만족도는 최상이었어요~ 전체적인 분위기와 매너가 좋았어요. 힙지로의 매력을 부담없이 느끼고 아이와 함께 할 수 있는 맛집들도 👍 즐거웠어요~', '룸 컨디션도 좋고 남산뷰도 좋았고 조식도 괜찮고 수영장도 괜찮고 직원분들도 친절하고 재방문 의사 높음', '직원들의 점잖은 태도와 전체적인 서비스도 마음에 들고 , 조용한 분위기가 좋다. 음식도 너무 맛있었고 미니바 이용도 너무 좋았다.', '동생 신행 가기전에 예약해줬는데 둘다 너무 좋았다고 하더라구요 침구도 조식도 다 훌륭했다고합니다 위치가 전 첨에 생뚱맞아서 다른 호텔 예약해주려했는데 호텔 후기가 좋고 동생이 원해서 해줬었거든요 하루 잘 쉬다왔다고 해서 다음에 저도 한번 가보려구요', '소문대로 해피아워와 조식 음식이 맛있어서 잘 쉬다 왔어요^^', '조용해서 편안히 잘 쉬다 왔습니다 룸 컨디션도 괜찮았고 조식도 맛있었습니다 다만 욕실 청결 상태가 조금 아쉬웠습니다 프런트 직원에게 얘기했는데 생각보다 응대도 조금 아쉬웠답니다', '너무너무 행복한 추억만들었어요 감사드립니다^^ 다음에 또이용할게요 기억해주세요❤️', '주말에 갔는데 사람도 그렇게 많지도 않고 수영장도 좋았습니다 ~', '약간 호텔 주변에 뭐가...없다는? 그런 것 빼곤 호텔 자체로는 쉬고 먹고 편안했습니다', '갑작스런 일정 변경으로 방을 하나 더 잡아야하는 문제에 당황하지 않게 도움을 주신 프런트의 직원과 조식당에서 편안하게 식사할 수 있게 도와주던 직원들 모두 고마웠습니다', '가격대비 방도 깨끗하고 넓고 뷰도 좋았습니다 직원분들은 다 친절하셨고.. 야외수영장을 5만원내고 들어가야하는점 외에는 다 만족하였어요', '예약여부 확인하던 문 앞 그리팅부터 시작해서 서비스 적인 면, 시설이나 편의적인 부분 모두 2%부족한 느낌이예요. 로비의 크기나 서비스 품질은 특급호텔이라 보기는 힘들었고 비즈니스 호텔 수준이었습니다. 청결, 위생, 조식은 만족스러웠습니다. 다만 조식뷔페 식음파트 직원 분들은 불친절합니다. 9시 45분쯤 로비 카페 쇼케이스 아래에 케이크가 훤히 비추었는데도 케이크가 다 품절되었다고 말합니다. 편의점도 밖이고 룸서비스 메뉴도 부실하여 10시가 넘으니 할 수 있는게 없었어요. 야외수영장은 가격대비 너무 작고 실내 수영장은 무료로 이용하기엔 무난했습니다. 전반적인 아쉬움이 많습니다. 호캉스를 위해서는 비추입니다. 그냥저냥 여행객이나 출장객에게 적합해보여요~', '야외풀이 이쁘고 좋아요', '해피아워도 넘 좋았고 조식도 넘 맛있고~ 주변에 맛집도 많아서 해피아워 먹고 야식 먹으러 또 나가서 놀고 그랬네여 ㅋㅋㅋㅋ남산뷰도 넘 좋고 시티뷰도 좋고 다 좋았습니다^^ 직원들도 왕친절하시고👍🏻담엔 부모님 모시고 가고 싶더라고요~!', '물놀이를 좋아하는 아기와 함께 이틀간 즐거운 호캉스 보내고 왔어요. 수영장을 맘껏 이용할 수 있어서 너무 좋았어요^^', '실외수영장은 안가봤는데 아쉽네요 아이들과 즐거운 시간 보내고 서울 여행도 하고 좋았어요', '수영장 바로 옆 객실이라서 너무 좋았어요~', '여자친구랑 너무 힐링하고왔습니다! 자주가고싶을정도에요!', '앰버서더 서울 풀만 호텔은 이번이 두번째 이용이었는데 2년전에 리노베이션이 되어 더 좋아졌더군요. 남산과 명동 가까운 입지는 최고이고 호텔시설은 깨끗하고 객실 남산뷰도 좋았습니다~ 넷플릭스도 볼수 있었고 조식과 해피아워 음식도 만족스러웠습니다 다음에 또 이용의사 있어요~!', '객실 상태, 직원 서비스, 해피아워 맛,분위기 등등 모든게 좋았어요', '시설 깨끗하고 직원분들 친절하고 많은 것들이 좋은여행이였습니ㅏㄷ', '조식이 특히 맛있고 서비스 수영당 다 만족스렂습니다', '아주 좋았습니다', '클럽룸으로 예약했고 2시반부터 애프터눈 티 이용가능해서 2시반이 도착하니 체크인을 시작하고 있더라구요 인원도 많이 없었고 빨리 방에 들어갈 수 있겠구나 했는데 데스크는 3개인데 한 곳에서만 체크인을 해주고 있었고 나머진 직원들끼리 수다떨고 계시더라구요. 인원도 얼마 없었는데 3시10분이 넘어가고 너무 느리길래 가서 얼마나 걸릴까요 물어보니 다다음 순번이라고 하길래 기다렸고 20분이 걸려도 안 부르길래 봤더니 직원들끼리 수다떨고 있고 아직도 데스크 한 곳에서만 손님 맞이하고 있길래 다시 가서 물으니 컴퓨터가 다운이(?)됐다며 더 기다려 달라그래서 3시 40분에 체크인이 되었습니다. 원래 여기 체크인 오래걸린다는 후기를 봐서 에휴 그런가보다 하고 방에 들어가서 수영장가려고 옷 다 벗고 갈아입으려는 순간 다른 커플이 카드키 대고 문을 따고 들어왔고 그 분들은 저희 알몸을 다 봤구요 양쪽 다 소리지르고 당황하고 난리였습니다. 방 배정을 중복으로 해서 그분들도 같은 방을 배정 받았더라구요. 항의하려고 하니 남편이 말려서 참았고 그 카드키 열고 들어 온 커플은 꽤 오랜시간 복도에서 다른 방배정 기다리고 계시더군요 일단 빨리 수영장 가자고해서 수영장 이용했고(수영장 사진보다 훨씬 후져요) 수영장 다 이용한 뒤 가운만 입은채로 방에 내려와서 카드키를 대니 문이 열리지않았습니다. 아까 그 커플한테 나눠준 키가 마지막으로 등록이 된거여서 저희 키가 안 먹힌거더라구요. 복도 전화기로 전화했고 키 다시 갖다 준다고만 하지 사과는 없었습니다. 직원이 10분정도나 걸려서 올라왔고 저희는 다 젖은채로 가운만입고 남들 체크인하러 지나다니는데 복도에 그러고 서있었어요…와서도 사과 한마디는 없어서 어이가 없어서 여기 도대체 몇성급인데 이래요? 하니까 그제서야 사과를 하더군요 진짜 직원들 상태 최악입니다 여기 10만원대도 아니 모텔도 이러진 않아요;;; 괜찮은거라곤 해피아워 음식이 다녀본 호텔 들 중에서 제일 괜찮았고 조식도 먹을만해요 그 외에는 정말 다시는 가고 싶지않은 호텔입니다 수영장 너무 후져요', '바로 직전에 페어몬트, 소피텔을 방문했지만 그에 뒤지지 않는 서비스와 시설 품격을 갖추고 있습니다 리모델링한지 얼마 되지 않아 모든 것이 깨끗하고 라운지 서비스는 최고입니다 아마도 인근 하얏트나 신라, 반얀트리 등과 비견해도 남산뷰는 빠지지 않아요! 이용 기간 동안 수영장과 사우나를 이용하지 못해 아쉽지만 만족도가 정말 높은 호텔입니다', 'ㅈㅎㅎ아요', '수영장과 조식을 이용못해서 아쉽네요./ 주말에는 웨딩 관련 손님들로 북적이는 것 같아요', '투숙객 할인도 별로 안되고 가격대비 수영장 등 시설 비용이 넘 비싸네요', '조식이 더 종류가 많구 맛있어요. 그래도 디너도 훌륭했습니다. 국물류가 디너엔 거의 없어서 그게 조금 아쉬웠어요. 애프터눈티셋트는 기대 안하시는게 좋구요. 근처에 유명한 빵집 있으니 거기서 점심 겸 빵 먹구 가셔도 좋을 것 같아요 (태극당) 그리고 수영장은 서울에선 가장 좋은 편인 거 같아요 (커플이 놀기에)', '모든 시설이 깨끗해서 정말 좋았습니다', '라운지 조식 푸드 다 맛있었고 룸 컨디션도 좋았습니다. 요청사항도 바로바로 빠르게 대응해주어서 편리했습니다. 또 가고싶어요 !', '우선 라운지 공사로 인해서 이그제큐티브 라운지를 사용하지 못했지만 저녁 뷔페 퀄리티랑 수영장 너무 좋았습니다. 외부 수영장에서 너무 잘 놀았고 석식 뷔페 퀄리티는 다른 유명한 호텔들 보다 넘 좋았습니다', '식사도 수영장도 객실도 좋았어요 합리적인 가격이 특히 매력적이에요', '시설이야 어디나 별차이럾지만 조식만큼은 아주아주 훌륭했어요', '가격이 주말이 껴있어서 비쌌지만 깨끗하게 잘 있다가 왔어용', '부모님이 잘 주무셨다고 하시네요', '만족스러웠어요', '깨끗하고 수영장도 좋고 테라스에서 파는 치킨도 맛있었어요', '해피아워 훌륭합니다', '프론트직원이 기본 1명. 호텔수준에 비해 접객태도가 비지니스호텔 이하. 근처 음식집 물어보니 저쪽가면 고기집 많다고... 다른 직원분들은 친절하시고 프로급. 실내온도가28도인데도 냉방이 되질 안아 연락했더니 야간에는 냉방시설전원을 끈다면서 선풍기 가져오고 창문열라고 한다. 민박집이냐. 어이가없음. 다른분들 후기에도 적혀있던데 냉온방기기가 고장난것 같습니다.방 배정받은후엔 냉방되는지 부터 알아보세요. 호텔들어서는 순간부터 할아버지향수냄새가 진동합니다. 샤워젤,샴푸 등 따로 챙겨가시는것을 추천합니다.', '많이 웃고 행복했던 시간들이고 욕조와 어메니티가 훌륭했습니다 라운지와 조식부페도 정갈했구요', '룸 컨디션이 매우 좋았어요~ 위생, 청결은 기본이었고 남산뷰도 너무 좋았습니다 ! 부대 시설도 다 갖춰져 있고, 조식도 좋았습니다 `', '언덕이 높지만 좋아요 깨끗해요', '남산뷰가 이쁘고 수영장도 이쁨 근데 수영장 물온도 살짝 추움 그리고 객실내 욕탕 사진보다 많이작음', '말소리가 다 들려요.', '테이블이든 화장실이든 이불 끝자락 같은 사용할때 보일만한곳이 청결하지 못했던거같아요 그부분만 빼면 다좋았어요', '숙소가 5층이었는데 야외수영장 뚜껑뷰라 놀랬어요. 체크인 시 미리 얘기했으면 좋았을텐데 슈페리어룸은 5층이 최고층이다라는 얘기만 들었네요. 생각보다 컨디션은 너무 좋았지만 바로 앞이 수영장이라 그런지 소음이 있어서 아쉬웠어요.', '훌륭한 숙소 입니다', '체크인시 부대시설 설명이 없었다', '가격 대비 편하게 쉬고 업무 보았습니다', '편하고 좋았오요~^^', '가격대비 시설도 괜찮고 편하게 쉬고 갑니다.', '호텔이 깨끗하고 좋았습니다', '깔끔해요~ 야외 수영장 유료 운영은 아쉬워요', '완벽한 스테이였어요', '리모델링되어 깨끗하고 쾌적했습니다 위치가 좀 애매했지만 만족합니다', '친절한직원들 좋았습니다', '1. 객실 수 대비 공기청정기 부족 2. 인테리어는 최고! 3. 좀 더 깨끗하게 청소되면 좋을 것 같아요.', '전반적으로 만족하였으며, 도보로 종로쪽으로 산책을 다녀온 것도 기억에 남습니다.', '유아 숙박에 따른 추가 요청을 친절하게 잘 응대해주셨습니더. 시설 및 조식도 아주 우수했습니다. 야외 수영장은 아름다웠습니다.', '조식이 엄청 맛있었어요', '서비스 위치 모든게 다 마음에 들었습니다 한가지 아쉬운건 방음이 잘 안되는건지 입구쪽 룸이라그런지 바깥소리가 너무 잘들렸어요', '먹캉스하기에 너무 좋아요', '위치가 좀 애매한거 빼곤 맘에들었어요', '룸서비스 주문했는데 중간에 주문이 날아갔는지 이용하지못했지만 다른부분들은 좋았어요', '괜찮아요 직원들이 친절해요', '불편한점 없이 이주 만족했습니다~', '수영장 크고 깔끔', '정말좋은숙소엿어요', '휴가때 알차게 즐기다 갑니다~!', '완전친절 조식도 맛있고 룸건디션도 좋았음 실외수영장이 별도 이용료가있긴했지만 1회가 아니고 투숙중계속 이용할수있어서 좋았음', '일단 숙소 샤워 호스가 조절도 안되고 수압이 약해요.수영장도 사진보단 작고요', '정말 깔끔해서 숙박하기 좋았어요', '비가 엄청 오는날이라 주차장이 연결안된건 너무 불편하네요 수영장 작지만 깔끔하고 방도 쾌적해서 나쁘지 않았어요 날씨좋은날 방문하면 더 좋을듯 해요', '방문시 카펫에 이물질 있고 청소가 제대로 안되어있었어요. 얘기했더니 방 바꿔줘서 괜찮았는데 욕조에 있는 샤워기가 작동을 안하더군요 ㅠㅠ 저녁 11시쯤 직원이 와서 확인하고 샤워기이용 원하면 수리팀에서 와서 수리해준다는데 늦은 시간 수리해달라고 하기도 그래서 그냥 됐다고 했어요. 결국 준비해 온 입욕제는 사용도 못했네요 ㅠㅠ 조식은 괜찮았어요. 룸 상태가 안좋아서 실망감이 좀 컸어요.', '개인적으로 투숙의 시작은 체크인부터라 생각합니다. 라운지에서 앉아서 체크인하는 것을 좋아해서 이그제큐티브로 예약했고, 엘리베이터 앞에서 트레이니 분이 막아서길래 라운지에서 체크인하겠다고 이야기했습니다. 그런데 그 분이 휴대폰 번호 체크하시더니 번호가 다르다면서 로비 프론트데스크에서 체크인해야한다고 하더라고요. 라운지에서도 휴대폰번호 확인 동일하게 할 수 있는걸로 아는데 굳이 왜 거기로 안내하는지요. 결국 사람들 지나다니는 곳에서 다리 아프게 서서 체크인하고, 차별받는듯한 기분이 들어 굉장히 불쾌했습니다. 이그제큐티브에 대한 비용을 지불했으면 해당 서비스를 받을 수 있게 해야하는 것 아닌가요. 투숙의 시작부터 기분이 좋지 않았습니다.', '수영장 크기가 작아요. 별도 추가비용을 내고 사용하지는 않을것같아요. 조식 장소도 생각보다 작아요', '연박했는데 해피아워 음식, 더 킹스 조식 서로 겹치는것도 많고 구성도 안바뀌어서 매우 질렸음.. 조식불포함도 괜찮을거 같다. 파스타도 없고 ㅠ 한식류도 어정쩡했음.. 필라프 같은것도 없고.. 스테이크류도 없었음.. 애매한 음식이 아쉬움 ㅠ 주스류도 종류가 적고 음료수도 별로 없구..', '객실상태와 직원응대는 좋았으나, 최고층에있는 식당이용, 수영장 시설은 기대 이하였습니다. 패키지여행에서나 볼법한 느낌', '주차당 부터 정신이 없다. 백화점과 같이 쓰는 곳이라 복잡하기 그지없고 주변에 볼거리 할거가 없다 너무 복잡하고 호텔에서 식당 사는것도 멀고 숙소에서 밖으로 나갔다 다시 들어가는 과정도 복잡하다. 직원분들은 매우 매우 친절하심', '도심에 있어 호캉스 즐기기에 좋아요~ 남산이 가깝고 쇼핑즐기기에 동대문도 가까워 좋고 새로 리뉴얼돼어 쾌적하고 깨끗합니다']

name: 시그니엘 서울 (SIGNIEL SEOUL)
review: ['한 명이 더 추가되어 extra bed를 추가하고, 전망도 추가 금액을 내고 한강뷰로 변경하였는데, extra bed를 놓았지만 방이 좁지는 않았고, 서울 시내를 한 눈에 전망할 수 있는 한강뷰는 너무 멋있었네요. 너무 높아서 아찔했지만, 높은 곳을 좋아하시는 분은 최고로 만족스러운 숙박이 될 것 같네요. 방과 욕실 모두 깨끗하고, 잘 관리되고, 직원분들도 모두 친절하시고, 여러모로 만족스러웠습니다.', '시그니엘이라는 공간에서 경험하는 모든 것이 최고였습니다. 다만, 첫 방문이라 입구를 찾거나 엘리베이터를 찾는 것이 조금 어려웠습니다. 체크아웃 고객이 몰렸을텐데도 체크아웃이 광속으로 정확하고 빨랐습니다. 직원분들 다 친절하시고 예쁘고 멋지십니다. 라운지 샴페인 맛이 좋았습니다만, 솔직히 함께 곁들일 수 있는 음식은 좀 부족했던 것 같습니다. 아무튼 전반적으로 어떤 호텔 방문보다 만족스러웠습니다. 저는 당일 룸 업그레이드로 방과 화장실 한강뷰인 시그니엘 프리미어 더블 룸 99층을 숙박하였는데, 탁월한 업그레이드였습니다. 또 방문하고 싶습니다.', '뷰는 말할 것도 없고 시설이며 위치며 음식이며 서비스며 룸 컨디션이며 뭐 하나 아쉬운 거 없이 완벽했습니다 침구류는 얼마나 푹신하고 좋은지 가격이 아깝지 않았습니다 바로 석촌호수를 산책할 수도 있고 바로 옆에 롯데몰에 쇼핑이랑 구경거리도 많아 시간적 활용도 너무 좋았습니다 너무 만족해 6월달 또 방문할 예정입니다 호캉스 적극 추천!', '아이들 어릴 때 갔다가 몇년만에 찾은 시그니엘. 아이들 기억에도 좋았는지 다시 가고싶다고 한 곳이라 이번에 다시 가봤어요 룸 상태와 직원분들 친절한 건 말할것도 없고요^^ 개인칫솔과 클렌징 챙겨가세요 환경문제로 칫솔 사용시 유료입니다 ㅋ 한강뷰 업그레이드 안돼서 좀 아쉬웠지만 전망대에서 아쉬움을 달랬어요 담번에는 한강뷰로 묵고싶네요^^', '미국에서 한국에 도착하는날, 여독을 풀기위해 머무른 호텔입니다. 평소에 한국을 방문할 때마다 첫날은 무조건 괜찮다고 알려진 호텔에서 호캉스를 즐기는 것을 선호하는데요.... Conrad, Oakwood, Four Seasons 등등 많은 곳에서 돌아가며 휴식을 취해보았습니다. 그중에서 단연 으뜸이었습니다. 많은 분들이 가격대비라는 말로 호텔 서비스를 비교하시곤 하는데요, 사실 가격대비를 따지면 어떤 곳이 더 좋을지 모르겠네요. 각자 매력이 다르니까요. 중요한 점은 가격이 상관이 없으시다는 전제하에 퀄리티만 따져보자 하면, 무엇보다 주상복합 빌딩이었음에 불구하고, 고층빌딩이었음에 불구하고 공기가 좋았습니다. 저희는 평소에 알러지가 좀 있어서, 한국에 오면 첫날에는 항상 콧물이나 재채기를 하는 편인데, 이곳은 침구를 비롯하여 모든곳에 알러지 반응이 없어서 너무 쾌적했습니다. 무엇보다 중간 서비스로 저희가 룸을 비웠을때, 침구 정리가 되어있어서 너무 좋았습니다. 어메너티나 서비스 시설 면에서도 아주 좋았습니다. 저희는 방해금지 서비스를 신청한 상태였고, 그래서 서비스를 받을때 디리버리 서비스를 받을 수 있어서, 직원들과 마주치지 않는 점도 매우 훌륭했구요. 주변에 볼거리와 즐길거리가 너무 많아서 일정상 하루만 머무르는게 아쉬울 정도로 좋았습니다. 면세점, 백화점, 쇼핑몰 등등 시간을 보내기 부족할 정도로 많은 곳이 있었고, 너무 다양한 식당들도 플러스였습니다. 한가지 아쉬운 점은 저희는 라운지바에서 제공되는 스파클링 와인이 재료 소진으로 선택권이 제한되었다는 점, 스파클링 와인외에 레귤러 와인이 제공되지 않는 점이 아쉬웠습니다. 그외의 모든 점은 매우 훌륭했고, 다음번에 다시 이용하는데 주저하지 않을 만큼 행복했습니다.', '호텔을 많이 다녀본 입장에서 5성급다운 호텔이라고 생각해요 어떤 호텔은 뭐 하나만 요청해도 추가비용 들거나 상술인 곳도 있는데 가격 자체가 저렴하지는 않지만 친절한 건 기본이고 몸만 가도 모든 게 다 갖춰져 있어요 요청해도 모두 무료인 점이 5성급 답다고 생각합니다 게다가 분실물이 있었는데 무료로 택배 보내주셨네요 룸 컨디션과 뷰도 최고지만 서비스 최고에요 수영장은 작긴 하지만 피트니스 운동복 양말 무료 대여에 사우나도 좋아요 무엇보다 시그니엘만의 무료 라운지 혜택도 저는 서비스 차원에서 남다르다고 생각해요 벌써 두 번 가봤네요 외국인 친구에게 한곳만 추천하라면 시그니엘 서울 추천합니다 (주차는 처음에 복잡하니 미리 잘 살펴서 팁 보고 가시길 추천이요)', '직원분들이 친절한 건 말할 것도 없고 숙소 이용하면사 라운지 이용도 좋았고 방 상태도 너무 좋았습니다. 다음 번에 또 이용하겠습니다', '어머니 생신 기념으로 예약해 드렸습니다. 개인사정상 어머니 홀로 호텔을 이용하셨습니다. 70대 후반이신 어머니께서 불편없이 긴장감도 없이 매우 친절한 직원분들의 서비스와 훌륭한 호텔시설을 잘 받으셨습니다. 매우 감사드립니다. 총총', '기념일로 방문 했습니다. 역시 모든 직원분들 친절하셨고 시설 또한 최고 , 뷰가 최고네요 다음에 또올게요!!!', '직원분들한테는 별 100개 주고 싶을정도로 친절하시고 부산 시그니엘 방은 좀 작았는데 서울 시그니엘은 그것보단 커서 너무 좋았어요 그리고 아무리 낮은 층이어도 따지고 보면 엄청 고층이니까 몇층이든 다 만족하실거예요 무엇보다 샴페인 무한으로 먹을 수 있는게 술쟁이들한텐 큰 장점 여러분 김부각 꼭 드세요!!! 김부각 맛집! 글구 욕실이랑 객실 한강뷰에 돈 쓰지 마시고 조식에 쓰세요 조식 꽤 괜찮았어요', '직원분들께서 너무 친절하게 대해주시고 짐이 많았는데 옮겨주시기도 해서 너무 편하게 다녀왔습니다. 무엇보다도 야경이 너무 아름다워요. 또가고 싶네요', '특별한 날 특별하게 선물 할 수 있는 분위기와 하루를 만들어 줍니다. 주차장이 너무 넓어 당황했지만 주차 요원이 호텔 입구와 가까운 구역을 잘 설명해주었고, 리셉션까지 엘베를 2번 갈아타야 하지만 그로 인해 시간이 지체되거나 오래 기다리는 일이 없이 이용이 편리했습니다. 라운지 이용과 조식은 호텔 가격에 비해 조촐하다 생각이 들기도 하지만 막상 이용하면 한 번은 와볼만 하다 할 정도의 메뉴와 친절한 직원의 응대는 엄지척입니다. 룸 컨디션은 최상이며, 전망 또한 어디서도 느껴보지 못할 공간이라 생각이 듭니다. 웰컴티와 쿠키도 너무 좋았으며, 룸서비스 메뉴 가격이 비싼 점이 단점이라면,, 음식은 매우 맛있어요!! 메뉴도 다양하고, 코로나만 아니면 더 많은 부대시설과 함께 휴식을 만끽할 최상의 공간이라 생각합니다.', '개인적으로 프로포즈를 준비해서 짐을 많이 싣고 갔는데 호텔 정문에서 짐 많다고 하면 짐도 다 받아서 객실까지 옮겨주시고, 발렛도 선택 가능합니다. 객실에서 퇴실할 때도 짐도 다 받아서 1층까지 내려주는 등 여러모로 친절하고 편리했습니다', '가족 여행으로 다녀왔습니다. 뷰가 사방 막힘 없어 서울 시내 및 인근 수도권 지역은 다 보이는 것 같아요. 무엇보다 객실 상태가 아주 청결하며 서비스 응대가 다른 어느 곳 보다 최상입니다. 기념이 될 만한 날에 묵으시면 좋을 것 같아요', '고층에서 바라본 서울한강의 풍경은 감동이었습니다. 높은곳에서 보는 풍경은 마치 특별한 나 자신이 특별해졌다는 기분까지 들게 할만큼 새로운 경험이었습니다. 또한 시그니엘에서 근무하는 모든 직원들이 편안하고 친절했습니다. 그들이 제공하는 서비스만으로도 충분히 재방문의사가 결정될만큼, 감동적인 서비스였습니다. 4월 22일 체크아웃 전에 개인사정으로 어쩌면 실례가 될수도 있는 부탁을 드렸음에도 불구하고 흔쾌히 해결해주셨습니다. 정말 감사합니다. 4월 22일 오전에 프론트에서 , 프론트 기준으로 맨 왼쪽에서 근무 하시던 지원분에게 감사드립니다. 다른 분들 모두에게 감사드립니다. 하루이지만 정말 특별한 경험과 행복한 추억을 만들어갑니다.', '아이랑 동반해서 리버뷰 욕실전망까지 추가해서 1잣 제대로 호캉 했습니다. 결혼기념일 이벤트도 성공적이었고 잊지 못할 추억 이었습니다. 아고다 어플로 저렴하게 이용 하여 상당히 만족 스러웠습니다. 조만간 또 이용 할 예정이에요 감사합니다', '결혼 준비하면서 프로포즈하려고 호텔 찾다가 시그니엘이 좋아보여서 예약하고 숙박을 했는데 솔직히 금액이 비싼 편임에도 불구하고 전혀 아깝지 않고 너무 좋았습니다 자주는 못 가더라도 기념일 때 올 의향이 너무 생겼어요', '바로 옆에 수족관과 롯데월드가 있어서 2박3일간 알찬 시간을 보낼 수 있었습니다. 일단 시그니엘의 전 직원들들은 눈이 마주치면 웃어주시고 친절한 말한마디라도 해주시더라구요. 체크인&아웃시에도 앉아서 편히 도움을 받았고, 턴다운 서비스때마다 모자란 부분들이 있을 때마다 다 채워넣어주셨고, 조식을 먹을때도 친절하게 안내해주시고, 아이들을 배려해주셔서 기분좋은 식사를 할 수 있었습니다. 사실 5성급호텔은 기본적으로 친절하긴 한데, 여기는 사무적이지도 않았고 뭔가 진심이 뭍어나오는.. 그야말로 최상의 서비스를 받은 듯 하여 매우 만족하고 다시한번 방문하고 싶어지는 곳 입니다.', '직원분들 모두 굉장히 친절하셨고 요청한 서비스에 대한 것들도 빠르게 해결해 줬었습다. 쇼핑몰과 연결되어 있어서 이용하기도 편리했고 호텔 안에서의 뷰는 정말 너무 아름다웠습니다. 최고의 위치였어요! 같이 이용한 사람또한 매우 만족해 했습니다. 생일 기념일로 방문했는데 매우 만족 했고 행복하고 즐거운 시간을 보내고 왔습니다! 또 한번 이 호텔에 머물고 싶어요!!', '호캉스 안한 사람은 있어도 한번한 사람은 없다더라구요...첫 호캉스를 친구들과 90층 높이에서 하다보니 정말 색다르고 힐링되는 경험이었습니다.']

name: 롯데호텔 서울 (Lotte Hotel Seoul)
review: ["This was the perfect hotel for our first visit to Seoul. The rooms were clean and the location was awesome. It is walking distance to Myeongdong and Namdaemun Market. A little further walk and you can get to Gyeongbokgung Palace. To get anywhere else, the subway and bus stops were very close by. The real stand out for us, though, were the staff. They were super attentive and friendly the entire stay. One person stood out in particular as we were heading to the airport with all our luggage. I didn't get his name, but he was awesome! He noticed that a driver mistakenly took my sister's luggage along with another group's to presumably a car on the street. We were confused because we thought this other worker knew where our car was. Once he and I realized that was not the case, he ran after him and got our stuff back. We were super grateful to him so shout out to him. You are awesome! Lotte Hotel Seoul is definitely going to be my go-to hotel for my future visits back to Korea. Highly recommended!", 'This is what you would expect from a great 5-star hotel in Seoul. My rooms were not ready so my check in time was delayed. But they compensated me with a bottle of wine and rooms upgrade! The rooms are clean and well maintained. The breakfast offers wide selection. Location-wise, it is just within walking distance to Myeong-dong and Lotte malls. I could not ask for more.', 'Prime location. The road is quite busy. Easy access to all touristy location especially myeongdong street. Taxi is easy to get. Staff is helpful. Room is clean. Lotte duty free & department store is connected to hotel thus easy to shop & to find food. Room amenities is ok. Can order halal food from room service but only 1 menu available. No complaint really.', 'I am so pleased with this hotel. The service is second to none and all the staff members are extremely helpful, polite, and kind. We are traveling with adults, elderly adults, and young children and all of us have been happy here. There’s plenty to see, do, and eat. The hotel is attached to Lotte Town which are 3 department stores connected on a couple of floors. There’s something for everyone! It is also right outside of a train station which makes commuting options nice with taxi vs subway/train. Myeongdong is across the street so for those interested, it’s a quick walk. Many eateries and convenience stores (and grocery stores) are just across the street. Currency exchange kiosk is in the lobby - just need your passport. I’ll 10000% always choose this hotel again for every Seoul trip.', 'Im glad i choose this hotel. Location is perfect. From the day we arrived for check in till the day we checked out, all the staff is friendly and helpful. Room is cozy eventhough no toothbrush provided but thats fine coz we always bring our own. They provide good quality shampoo ,conditioner and shower bath. The bed super duper cozy. I got no negative comment. Infact im returning back there hopefully same month for 2023. ❤❤❤', 'The price is worth the stay. Convenient and staff is efficient. Room is spacious. The lighting in my deluxe twin is too "romantic" for my taste but we made do. We had to use the table lights to pack properly, it got too dim after 8pm.', 'stayed with 2 young kids in this wonderful hotel. Room is a bit small but service and location made it all up. Hotel staff came within 5 mins to solve all the problems in the room (to fix broken light bulb, refill shower gel... etc) Although most extra requirement (like birthday cake surprise and carton box for packaging) came with extra cost, they are all worthwhile to create good memory with family.', 'Super polite and helpful concierge staff. resto recommendations and bookings prior to the trip, to other bookings during the stay, they were all helpful! Kudos to this amazing team! Breakfast was amazing! so many food choices and we loved the coffee bar. We loved the location of the hotel its connected to Lotte Dept store and just a few minutes walk to Myeongdong.', 'Best tasting food, known for its famous pastries made by Delica Hans, bat location in the heart of Myeong-dong downtown & best hotel rate value. Best of the best in totality!', 'The room is spacious and clean. The drop down window allows ample sunlight to come in as well as a good view outside. The hotel is linked to Lotte Departmental store which is perfect if you don’t feel like walking outdoor during cold winter days.', 'The room is nice though quite small, The twin beds are also small, if only for 2 person still okay. The bathroom is nice with small bathtub. Beautiful lobby and hotel area in general especially during Christmas. Easy access to the mall with the foodcourt. You can get everything you need. Also easy access to the subway. Airport shuttle stops in front of the hotel.', 'Pros: 1. Excellent location, shop straight from basement at lotte department, food places, avenuel, young plaza, myeongdong basement shopping strip and connect directly to myeongdong street via basement. (great for cold winter or rainy days). 2. Excellent service from the crew at lotte hotel, be it the front desk, concierge standing outside (they are very hardworking, professional and helpful). 3. Tip top service from the cleaning lady on the 29th floor (she knows and remember what we needed during our stay so she will top it up for us everyday. Thank you) 4. Beautifully decorated hotel during christmas with many nice christmas trees all around. really put you in the mood. Well done. 5. Comfortable bed. Not forgetting the powerful rainshower in the bathroom. Felt sad when i came home to my pathetic rainshower pressure. Haha. 6. Large and safe hotel. No dodgy businesses here. Great for families. 7. Many facilities: we used the spa, hotel lounge, cake shop, buffet at La Seine, courier services due to overloaded luggage, etc. Cons: 1. Traffic is extremely congested around this area. There are protest along the street on saturdays. Can be a headache to catch a taxi. 2. Very busy hotel with many people all day at the lobby. Definitely not quiet. 3. Room is old (Main Tower). 4. Breakfast is nothing to rave about.', 'This is really a 5-star hotel. The hotel is impeccable, the restaurants serve fine dining and the staff and service are incredible. From giving us directions around Seoul to translating things we did not understand. All done with professionalism and a smile. Myeongdong is 10 mins away through the underpass directly from the hotel so you have everything that you need…food, drinks and shopping close by the hotel. Thank you for a great stay!', "Our family travelled with small children and elderly, so we greatly appreciate the service extended by all the staff. Our pram got broken during the trip and the hotel provided us a pram to use, free of charge. The hotel staff, Alice Kho, also helped us secure a reservation in a restaurant that does not accept walk-in diners. She relayed to the restaurant our food orders too. Excellent service, and location. We'll definitely stay here when we visit Seoul again.", "We commend the excellent service of the Lotte Executive Tower. Our 6-night stay was very comfortable -- they would regularly change our bedroom slippers and provide extra bottled water. These small gestures were greatly appreciated. Hailing a taxi from the hotel's taxi stand was not a problem too.", 'Clean, location is good', 'Old room, not new equipment. Convenient location, very delicious breakfast.', "Best location for Myeongdong center, Staff were friendly and helpful. Hotel was clean and toilet cleansing products provided were premium quality. Unfortunately, for the premium price, my booking didn't include breakfast.", 'It is ridiculous to charge for hotel sauna given that they already charge high room rate.', 'The room is a bit dated and needs improvement, the lighting is poor. A mixing valve for the hot and cold water supply will help instill a more modern feel for the utility. There are no hooks for robe or clothes in the toilet.', 'Great stay as usual.', 'Convenient, clean,big room All 5 stars And around there is so easy to eat, shop and everything u need as family for visiting', "Location is prime, directly linked to underground Metro station, and Lotte Departmental store. Also, just a stone-throw away from Myeongdong shopping street! Not my first stay here, and definitely won't be my last (if I visit Seoul again) Very yellow lightings in the room makes it hard to make up though! Other than that, really like and enjoy the hotel stay for my trip.", 'This location is excellent for a solo traveler. It is also nice if traveling with a group of friends. The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The rates are pricy, the queue for the breakfast buffet & Sunday brunch can be a timely wait . And', 'I thoroughly enjoyed staying at this Hotel. It is located at a prime location that is most suitable to travellers with young children. The gym is amazing.', 'The hotel was at an excellent location. It is across the road from the main myeongdong walking street and also directly an underpass to the subway. The room was also clean and staff were very responsive. Highly recommend!', 'The hotel was in a very convenient location, close to myeongdong night market, shopping, and the subway. The staff was extremely friendly and there was no language barrier communicating in English. The room was extremely spacious and had a beautiful view of the N Seoul tower and the city view. Overall I had a great stay at the hotel and always felt safe as a solo traveler and would recommend to others.', 'Staff was great, hotel and restaurants were awesome and location was close to night market', 'Booked 2 deluxe double rooms, managed to get Namsan Tower view without requesting, fanstastic. Room size was great, able to open 2 big luggage and still walk around. Bed super comfy, toilet super clean. Daily room cleaning was top level. Location-wise, cant get any more convenient in terms of airport limosine, connecting malls, connecting transports. Best is taking taxi back to hotel, just say Lotte Hotel Myeongdong and any driver knows it! Make no mistake this is Lotte Hotel, not the "budget" versions of the Lotte Hotels around the area. If u are travelling with kids or seniors, this is the best hotel to stay given how accessible and safe it is. Staff were very friendly too. Previously was kind of apprehensive about the hotel as some reviews claimed negative stuff about the hotel , room, staff, didnt feel any of it during my 7 nights stay. Not the cheapest hotel, but gonna be worth every penny. Will return again for sure!', 'Our 3 night stay was very amazing. The room was cleaned everyday. The size of the room is just perfect for couple. The buffet breakfast was superb. So far, it is the best breakfast we have tried in a five star hotel. The location of the hotel is plus point. It is beside a mall and Lotte Department store and just across Myeongdong food street. In front is the airport limousine bus airport terminal. We opted to ride the bus instead of the train going back to airport. Surprisingly, it was very convenient for us with luggages.', 'The location is so good very near in Myeongdong area,the staff the facilities all over is so good. a little bit pricery but over all is good.', '1. Airport bus stops right outside , 2. Fitness center provides Tshirt & shorts, bottled water, towels, shower & locker at no charge, 3. Has Sulwhasoo spa if you want to book a facial or massage, 4. Has duty free shops & free vip membership where you can earn points, purchases are sent to airport duty free & you pick up before your flight, 5. Food court downstairs and grocery mart, bakeries etc. 6. Subway access from hotel, 7. Walking distance to myeongdong and Namdaemun shopping areas. We love staying at Lotte- we’ve been on four trips to South Korea and always start at Lotte Jamsil and end at Lotte Seoul.', 'Probably the best hotel and I absolutely loved staying in both towers. This hotel has everything including the department store, restaurants, market, and etc. I will continue to stay only at this hotel everytime I visit Korea.', "Prime location, less than 10 min walk to Myeongdong night market and shopping street. Concierge and staff were impeccable. Swimming pool, hot tubs and sauna/spa sooo perfect to start or end the day. Refrigerator, and hot water pot in room, no microwave. Room on 19th floor was a little warm even with A/C. Location terrific to catch bus, train, taxi, and KAL airport limo. Great food and shopping close by. Everyone knows Lotte Hotel. Planning to stay here again.', 'Great location, great bed. The only complain I have is that the bathtub is too high and makes getting in the shower a bit of a chore for older people or people with leg injury.', 'It was a great experience to stay at Lotte hotel. Everything was a package of perfection. Thanks', 'Excellent location for river north. All walking distances to many historic and shopping sites.', 'Lotte hotels are iconic and live up to their reputation. Service is impeccable. Rooms are typical size for crowded cities. But we were 5 people and had 5 pieces of luggage. We had 2 connecting rooms so it wasn’t so bad. We had 2 twin beds in each room and my 9 year old son and I slept on 1 with good space. They seem bigger than US standard twin. Location is amazing. Subway is right in front. Myeongdong is a 3 minute walk. Everything is so close.', 'What I like the most: they allowed me to check in earlier, easy access to the mall, they didnt try to offer lavish taci to the airport and just ordered a regukar metered taxi, neearby myeongdong walking area and the subway station (Euljiro ill ga) I am a bit surprised they only provide instant coffee in the room, also no seat at all at the lobby in case you have to wait. The hotel claimed they have designated smoking area, but it was actually a public facility outside the hotel, you need like 3 mins walk from the Main Tower.', "This hotel is the landmark in the heart of Seoul. The staff are kind and the place is clean. They staffed up the lobby and you can get help anytime. Housekeeping ladies are so friendly and ensure your amenities don't run out. Overall, the place is pleasant to stay. I love their absolute kindness which is the pride of Lotte.", 'The location was good. You can pass through the basement to get to the mall but note that it is still quite a walk to get to Myeong Dong. Room was nice and clean and there was 5 of us staying and they gave us a connecting room which was much appreciated.', "Location is very convenient, where it's within walking distance to shops, restauarants, entertainment, etc. Luxury hotel at reasonable prices with full service staff", 'The Lotte Hotel Seoul is in a great location. My son and his friend loved that they could get to the train station from level B1, as well. The hotel is walking distance to Myeong Dong Street which is fun for street food, shopping, and just strolling about. Hotel staff were all great.', 'NA', "the whole style & room furnish's too old. large room but the space didnt be fully utilised, e.g. the location of USB ports and sockets", 'I suggest you add a service the communication with deaf people from foreigners. Room was clean and comfy. Overall would come back again when coming to Seoul again.', 'Excellent experience. Great service, staff, location, and view. I would definitely recommend this hotel.', 'Clean and convenient location but lights in room were dim', 'Fantastic location, connected to mall, subway and myeondong walking street. Rooms are however dated and not good value for money. You are paying for the location only. Breakfast spread is great but exactly the same food served from dec 2022 to may 2023.', "This hotel is designed to make you pay. There is not even a place for you to sit in the grand lobby because they want you to sit in the bar and buy a very expensive drink. Unlike other Asian hotels that provide accessories, they CALLED me after I have already checked out and at the airport to inform me that someone in our group used a toothbrush that they have in the room FOR CHARGE though nothing in the room indicates that you have to pay for the brush. The hotel has a sauna but guests have to pay to use it because they reserve it for members of their health club. The swimming pool is not big enough to swim laps. The room is SMALL even by urban city hotel standards. The only thing going for it is it's walking proximity to Myeong dong walking area. There are many less pretentious hotels in nice areas that actually cares about it's customer experience without nickeling and diming them. STAY AWAY unless you want to pay for the prestige that the LOTTE corporate name that apparently it carries in Seoul.", 'Stayed in a superior twin room, with a nice view, but being near the elevator lobby, the noise from the corridors traveled through. Room was smaller than expected without enough space to place two suitcases where they were accessible. One suitcase had to be stowed away to make space to move around. Room dad left uncleared on our second day in the hotel when we returned at 4pm which was disappointing given how much money we paid. Location is connected to the large lotte department store and the eujiro-1 subway station and next to myeongdong. Though no fault of the hotel, you should consider if myeongdong is an attraction you really want to be close to, when selecting your hotel location, as it will probably be sufficient to visit once.', 'Beautiful, clean , great location', 'Good location', 'All location, good service but the room cleaning was a bit too rush, left a few dirty towels on the floor…', '5 mins walk to subway , right beside Lotte mall which has full assortment of shopping / food etc . I could barely see my luggage while packing at night 3) very few electrical points - one main recessed charging point which meant bulky plugs could not fit. No charging point next to bed 4) the bellboys could be more helpful - I asked one to help me tell the taxi driver the address in korean and he said “just show what you have written”. Gee thanks 5) no turn down service It’s a 4 star hotel at best, nothing in it to command its price. My recommendation is to choose the Westin Josun next door.', 'Rather fancy hotel, the Staff and Korean clientele were dressed impeccably, walk straight into the Lotte mall and the impressive food hall. As a foreigner, it was easy to take the taxi as all the taxi drivers knew where the lotte hotel was. The hotel is connected to the department store, underground shopping, and a food court. Overall an excellent hotel.', 'Staff was amazing—all we encountered spoke English well and prioritized guests’ satisfaction. They make you feel like royalty. There was one hiccup at the end of our stay, but I could see they were doing all they could to get it sorted out. The rooms were a decent size. We stayed in the ‘Deluxe’ room type, but if we were to stay in the lower type it would’ve been too small so i recommend booking at least mid-range room. House keeping was very thorough! My complaint would be the many rules in place that seemed unnecessary from what we’re used to. The pool is very small and you have to wear a swim cap and use a floater in the tiny “lane” which guests are allowed to swim (the other tiny lane is for “members only”)—so skip the pool. Basically, we passed on most of the amenities that the hotel offered (most of which is not complimentary) due to being highly controlled which took the fun out of any of it. (They did move us; the room was comfortable enough.) Overall, it's fine for what it is. I'll add that 10 days earlier we stayed in their Club Level and it's certainly a different feel. I'd still rate staff Disappointing in the Club Level (some have an abruptness in manner that is off-putting). But it's relaxing and you're well looked after. The concierge and hotel staff helped with directions and taxis, which made getting around easy. It was a short walk to Myeong-dong, which had great street food and things to buy (the best tips were from Marie Kawaii's 15 things to do in Myeong-dong video on Youtube), and we liked the Lotte department store next door. My husband and I both found the hotel wi-fi to be super-quick and we would stay here for future business trips. We may just find two kids who now love Seoul stowing away in our luggage!", 'Perfect vibe and transportation', 'Everything was good. Just that room size abit small for 3 pax (superior room). The rooms are relatively spacious and location is great. The hotel is linked by underground pass to the Eujilro-1 ga Train Station (green line) and also a 5 minute walk to City Hall Train Station (blue line). The main Myeongdong street is just 5 minutes away by foot. But what sets the hotel apart is the service. This time I travelled alone with my 12 year old. She fell sick suddenly and the hotel staff offered us great help in searching for a nearby clinic on a Saturday. And as we are not conversant in Korean, a Front Service staff actually walked us to the clinic and acted as a translator throughout. We would have been so lost without their help. Great for exploring Seoul!!', 'Great hotel on good location', 'The hotel location is perfect !', "This is our 1st Lotte hotel experience, even though I've heard about this big local brand before. First, we were upgraded to a much bigger room, after we discovered a water leak in the room within 10 mins of walking in. (I doubt giving upgrades happen frequently though, so call it a blessing in disguise). The room was rather basic & small in the Main building, but the upgrade to the New Wing was modern, spacious with ample glass windows, natural light and city views. This was a pleasant surprise. The service was prompt and attentive. Molton Brown toiletries provided with glass shower & tub. Very clean. No molds to be found. (I'm a freak about this when it comes to bathrooms). High water pressure. The Concierge was very helpful, as far as airport transportation option. Free wi-fi..as well as access to the gym, sauna, jaccuzi & steam room. Some hotels charge extra for this, so that was nice. It was a really nice facility with locker rooms, which is set up like an onsen style. We were able to access this after our check-out, while we waited for our midnight flight. Some hotels are quite calculating about this. More importantly, there is an amazing gourmet quality Food Hall/Court & grocery store & department store downstairs, which makes it even more enjoyable and pleasant. The metro is just outside the hotel, and so are the pedestrian streets of Myeongdong. From a location, service and luxury perspective, this hotel ticks all the boxes. Highly recommend.", 'easy to KTS & shopping mall', 'One of the best five star hotel I ever stay. Good location and very convenient. I stayed in the new wing building, the carpet was a bit stained, and the bathroom tub and counter had an unprofessional caulking job. The tub was chipped, so it looked like they were trying to cover it up with white enamel paint, but the coating was too thin that you could see the black chip underneath it, that's why I gave it 3 stars. With that said, cleanliness is definitely 5 stars. Staff, the only reason I gave it 3 stars is that there seem to be a lack of American speaking staff, even in the registration area. either the Korean accent was too heavy that it was hard to understand them (my mom speaks with a heavy Korean accent and I can understand her and her friends) so it was really heavy that asking them to repeat a few more times didn't help me. Facilities - gorgeous, it is a beautiful hotel in the lobby area, 5 star worthy but in the room I felt I was in a Marriott. Overall, the reason that I would come back here is for the location, it can't be beat! it's literally right across the street from the Myeong Dong shopping area and the street food, you can choose to cross the street, or go under the hotel where there is an underground shopping center and subway system with great signage that me and my 2 children did not get lost. So on the days it rained we used the underground to walk, and on clear days we chose the street to cross. Under the hotel, Lotte has their own grocery store and a huge food court, so you don't have to go far for food, I only wished it opened earlier and closed later. I believe they opened at 10:30am and closed by 8:30pm. There are a lot of places opened in the surrounding areas though, and it was very safe. Also, the room was very comfortable.', 'Location and cleanliness, quiet, good facilities', 'It is connected to the metro train station, so it is good to beat the frustrating traffic jams if you need to move around the city. Retail shops and eateries are easily available, so any last minute purchase for visiting local hosts or friends back home is very convenient.', 'Location, accessibility, airport shuttle', "Location is good, but it could be better. It isn't centrally located in the Myeongdong area - one has to do quite a bit of walking to get there. The airport shuttle bus is located here, though. Renovated guest rooms are too modern for my taste. The new rooms may look sleek and impressive at first, but overall fail to provide a functional room layout. Bathroom division is all glass and noise from the bathroom can immediately be heard. Consequently, the toiletries almost always gets wet after a bath or shower. The sink area also gets flooded with just one use of the faucet, so I wouldn't recommend leaving your toiletries in the sink area either. In short, there's really no safe area to leave your toiletries inside the toilet. Expect your things to get soaking wet. Lots of dead empty space with regards to the closet space/area allotted for baggage that could've been designed better. Moreover, it's a bit inconvenient/out of reach from the whole room so you have to walk a bit to get your things. Wouldn't recommend the new room to families at all. Not to mention the fact that this hotel is expensive and the new rooms are not worth the price.", 'New, clean, close proximity to Myeongdong, excellent duty free shop', 'If weather is cold, it is a walk to Myeongdong unless connecting malls are open then you can be walk indoor.', 'Central location and on the airport bus route', 'I stay regularly at the Lotte hotel and find it generally satisfactory. Near to Lotte shopping mall, and Myeondong shopping areas ( walking distances ).', 'location', "good services, nice location, good food lovely hotel with good services , nice location and good food we're comfortable with our staying there good facility direct to lotte shopping centre thx for a wonderful holiday we will stay at this hotel if we visit seoul next family trip we hope to be arranged for a connecting room", 'subway just under ground', 'Most suitable hotel for business and leisure. Easy to go air port by shuttle bus.', 'Renovated, clean, convenient access to Duty Free, Department stores and short cut to Myeong Dong', "I think this is the best hotel in the area, though not as strategically located as Ibis or Royal hotel. You can pass through Lotte Dept. and Young store to get to Myeong dong. When it is winter time, this may be an issue when you want to stay in Myeong Dong past the mall closing time. We enjoyed our stay. The main wing is newer and renovated compared to the new wing, but the room sizes are smaller. I'm glad we stayed at the main wing. Raina at the concierge was especially helpful. Recommended a bunch of good restaurants to us and speaks very fluent english. Breakfast Buffet is overpriced, in my opinion. Housekeeping and bell service were also very efficient. Would stay here again.", 'The hotel is located near shopping malls and is easy to be accessed. The service is great and the hotel breakfast buffet provides a variety of choices of meals. The room service also offers a whole bunch of meal choices with excellent taste.', "Overall our stay at the hotel was wonderful. The hotel is nearby shopping malls and easy to go around. The hotel customer service officers were very helpful in explaining us to go around the cities and to point us to the directions we were looking for. The hotel's facilities are generally fine, even though we found the room is considered smaller than what we expected. However, this did not too bother us considering that we were happy with the hotel's other facilities. We certainly would considered it as value for money.", 'Nice service , good location , nice people , good hotel', 'we stay club room, Nice service , good location , nice people , good hotel', 'Location, service, support', 'One of the best hotels i have ever been into in my whole life. Great location ( every thing is so close to you). Staff are welcoming and smiley all the time. Room is in perfect size, super clean and worth every penny i have paid.', '9.0', 'Very deluxe hotel in heart of Seoul. Friendly stuff. Very clean in room. Great breakfast. A busy business area and shopping malls arround.', 'Facilites, furnitures, hotel design', "Two tumbs up for the overall accomodation! Staffs are all smiling faces, very accomodating and friendly. The hotel's facilities, furnitures and services are excellent. The location is perfect very near to almost all the places i wished to visit. Will definitely recommend to my friends.", 'location in downtown', 'great hotel, great rooms and fantastic staff. You are greeted by everyone and the staff is very helpful and readily provides information. Good english. needs no improvement', 'Excellent service, good location', 'Staff is always good which gives you a pleasant stay. Close to subway station is a plus. Restaurants are good, while nearby Myeongdong walking street gives you additional choices for shopping and dining. Good stay overall.', 'Location and shopping', 'The hotel is located in the very heart of Seoul. You will have all the interested places in a walking distance. Myeongdong is the place for shopping and experiencing Korean life style.', 'Location', 'The other hotel can compare with Lotte Seoul in terms of location. Whether you traveling business or leisure, can stay at this hotel and all the interesting places are in walking distance or have good access ways.', 'Hotel was lovely, service fantastic and the buffet restaurant is amazing!', "I loved this hotel. It was very cozy and comfortable although the rooms aren't very big. The staff was very nice and helpful. I had dinner 2 nights in the buffet restaurant and it was amazing! If you like oriental food I definetly recommend it. Location was good for shopping.", 'The room is so good and the bed so comfotable.', 'This is my first stay in Lotte. i have been in other Korean 5 star hotels and with out any doubt i can say that Lotte is indead one of the ebst hotles. i was shocked by the room, bed and bathroom size. everythig was so clean and organized. this is how a hotel rom should be. any less than this is just not acceptable.', 'Upgraded to deluxe room, fantastic', "Brilliant room, had seperate small sitting room. Extremely polite and helpful staff. Beautiful lobby and couldn't be better positioned for exploring Seoul. Myeongdong is brilliant. Concierge are very friendly and knowledgable to an extent, but could have passed on a little more local knowledge. Potentially the best xmas decorations in Seoul!!", 'Location', "The hotel is centrally located to the downtown area and is close to the US Embassy and multiple shopping areas. The staff is top notch and the rooms were clean but very small for the rates they charge. I'm not sure the hotel is worth the price they charge though. There are some very nice boutique hotels in the area and nearby in Myeongdong for about 1/3 the price. If money isn't an issue, then this hotel is a good choice for the location. But if you want to keep a couple hundred extra dollars in your pocket, then I'd shop around.", 'Clean', 'Very clean and comfortable, good services and good location', 'Linked to the Lotte Department store, English speaking staff', 'Apart from the room being too small to house our luggages n stuff (after much shopping), it is next to Myeong-dong a great shopping area with pushcarts stalls at night and a walking distance (stroll about 30 mins) to Namdaemun (shopping of whoelsale or local goods) & Insadong (Cultural area with museums). Worthwhile stay and taxi fee to Doongdaemun (clothes retail MEGA area) is only about 4000 to 5000 won. It is also easy for cab driver to bring us back to the hotel as it is a popular hotel which will minimise any searching/ misunderstanding. The TV channels in the hotel is quite extensive so we did watch some Korean movies/Variety shows and English re-runs in the room. As Myeong-dong area is just across the street, breakfast is easy as there is McDonalds, KFC,Coffee Bean Tea Leaf, and for lunch/dinner... TGIFridays, Outback Steakhouse....and many coffee joints, Starbucks, eateries in the day and the local Korean dishes can be found over there with some opened until mid-night. Paris Baguette bakery-cum-cafe opens from morning till midnight as well, so night snacks is of no problem at all. As I travelled in Dec,the weather is cold and wonderful. Any purchases in a shop above 30,000won, do ask for tax refund form. Wonderful Seoul deserves repeat visits!!', 'Location', "We got room at level 32 New wing Lotte Hotel, it is facing N Seoul Tower. Lobby is not at level 1 but somewhere else (level 14 if i'm not mistaken), bell boy hit my son with our luggage luckily no serious injury. Location is really good as it is just a few steps to lotte department store and myeongdong shopping district. We pay more to get bigger room, but i don't think the room is really bigger than what we expected. But yes we got pajamas and extra fruit and a small bottle of wine. More people can speak English here.", 'Lotte duty free, and Lotte department store, and myondong, and doota', 'Love the hotel best location ever Can go back to hotel to put down anything you brought easily and head back out to buy stuff Ard 5 mind car ride away from doors area Ard 5 minutes walk to myondong Right on top of lotte shopping complex', 'Clean, great location to subway restaurants.', 'Perfect location, taxi or subway or even walk to many attractions.', 'Location, Linked to Lotte Duty Free', 'A true five star hotel. Great Service. The bellman was actually a "bell lady" who picked up my heavy box and huge bag of shopping and brought it to the lift lobby for me the minute I got out of the taxi, before I could even ask for help. Room is however, pretty small, and probably not able to add a triple-share. There\'s a Korean handphone which you can make use of during your stay. Hence, you do not need to rent a set from the airport.', 'Staff who understand English, close proximity to department store, transportation and sights, clean and nice sized room, excellent buffet breakfast, pretty lobby', 'It was our first visit to Korea coming from the US. We loved the location, the professionalism of the hotel staff being very efficient and responding to our needs. Proximity to Duty Free Store and a large department store was a plus, too.', 'minimalis and modern look', 'Very wonderful room, it is connecting to the mall, close to one of famous are such as for street food, street market like Myeun-Dong area. Central area for everyone who traveled Seoul city greater area, easy accommodation and easy access from others area. good city view from high floor', 'minimalism and modern look', 'nice hotel, minimalism room but modern and cozy. nice spring bed for good sleep after back from working. central area for whom traveled around Seoul city greater area. easy to get accommodation and easy access from others area. good hotel service and good speaking skill in English and helpful. this hotel is good value for money', 'great location', 'great location for Businessman who just traveled around Seoul city greater area. easy to find accommodation and access to uptown area. very close to famous street food, street market and unforgettable sightseeing days and night. lovely hotel with helpful staffs and clean hotel room, with modern look. great city view at night from high floor', 'Location, room amenities', 'Room was great, service was good and the city view was a nice touch. Location wise next to euljiro-il ga station with a direct undergroun connection so that was good. Opp. myeong dong/ ibis hotel.', 'Great location , easy subway& Department store access', 'A bit pricey but definately top of the line standards & an excellant location', 'Great location', 'I am so lucky that hotel upgrade my room from superior to Deluxe business level. The room is big and clean, great connection of wifi in the hotel. Myeng Dong is just opposite our hotel (only 10 minutes by walk), restaurant and shopping are great. And the worst in this hotel is the house keeping staff is noisy during morning outside the room from 8am.', 'You do not need to leave the complex if you are there to shop.', 'Lotte has one of my favorite Duty Free shop, as they always seem to have a good selection of hard to get limited edition watches, and the price is good; once you become a VVIP member.', '', "This hotel has great location, city hall within 5-10 min walk and myeongdong nearby. I booked superior room which is a bit small, but it's quite convenient. Check-in was ok and fast. Since there's no breakfast for superior room, i had breakfast on my own at the lounge. Quite pricey, but the food was excellent and the restaurant got tall window with nice view of the park (colorful autumn trees). Shopping and eating was easy, lotte department store and myeongdong just a few steps from hotel. Subway also near, the hotel is located between euljiro 1(il) ga, or city hall station.", 'best location', 'The best hotel location in downtown area. And the staff is also very friendly.', 'Staffs & Club Lounge access', "In terms of hospitality, this hotel really impress me right from the moment I get off from my taxi. From the parking personnel, doorman, porter staffs, receptions, etc....they all bow to you and makes you feel like you are VIP guests. Location is in PRIME area. I don't think there is a better area for a hotel in Seoul. Club lounge is worth the $$. Free breakfast, afternoon snacks, wines & beers all day long :-) Also you have special reception desk if you are in Club level. Room is average size & comfortable. But there are many modern amenities you would not see in US hotels. Bed however is on the smaller side (vs. US five star hotels). But this is not a concern, at least for me. But for family travellers, this might be a slight drawback as single bed means for ONE person. Double bed is for TWO persons...MAX!! Extra bed is also not cheap. Last but not least, staffs do NOT expect any tips from you. Three times I tried to tips for some service, two of which actually declined because they say it is the hotel policy. I wished all hotels are like this :)", 'It links to Lotte Mall', 'I booked 3 days but only stayed 2 days, even could not claim back the refund but the service was very good, nice room, especially the strategic location.', 'Central location with good service', 'Great hotel,great location right next to Myeongdong. Service was good and smile. The room was clean and in beautiful condition.', 'Free Wifi, Location', 'stayed in the new rooms in the main building. cozy and perfect for one person, but a bit tight for two. beds are comfortable, not too hard or soft. there are two complimentary bottles of water everyday, a kettle with complimentary tea and the usual toiletries. best is the free wifi, have stayed at grand hyatt, the westin chosun and they charge for internet there. downside is it can be a bit noisy in the hallway, the doors are not really soundproof. also alot of mainland chinese love to stay here, so if you are a late sleeper it can be quite noisy in the mornings. also the concierge service is not as great here compared to westin chosun or grand hyatt, they are not as friendly or helpful.', 'Great rooms, department store right in the hotel', 'I found that the Lotte Hotel lived up to its reputation. With a grand lobby and beautiful marble concourses, there was a feeling of elegance right when you walked in the door. The service was outstanding from the moment I arrived. The doorman greeted me with a smile and promptly guided me to the front desk for check-in. The reception was excellent and check-in was very fast. For anyone thinking about traveling to Korea I urge you to go. The country is beautiful, the people are warm and inviting and most speak English.', 'Wifi, comfortable rooms, close to the Myeongdong area', "The Lotte Seoul Hotel was a luxurious hotel in the heart of Seoul. The rooms were small, but typical of Asia. They were beautifully decorated. The hotel was in walking distance of many attractions, and it was no problem to leave the hotel and find a cafe to eat at. We also were able to have hotel pick-up for our tours that we took in Seoul. My only complaint would be the hotel restaurant and bar prices. On a cold and rainy day, we decided to stay in the hotel. We ate at the Italian cafe. A glass of wine was 26,000 won (that was the cheapest option). Bottles of wine were from $200 - thousands of dollars. A cup of soup was 18,000 won. There were no cheaper options in the hotel. Luckily, you are not confined to the hotel normally and there are many, many great restaurants in the area, and there's always a 7-11 near-by where you can buy some wine or beer. I do recommend!!!!", 'centrally located at the heart of seoul, accessible by subway and bus, close to many markets', "the hotel is very nice with very professional staff. most if not all are proficient in english so they are able to assist you easily. if you want to move around seoul, you can ask the concierge to write down the directions for you in korean so it's easy to tell the taxi driver. ask a map from the receptionist or the concierge for easy reference. it came very handy for me. as for the room, it's standard for a full service hotel. the bed was firm but it felt cold even if i'm under the whole cover already. the shower was good and the toilet were good, but they only provided one soap for two people. they also gave us complimentary fruit and wine. the price though is a bit expensive for a standard hotel room, but i guess its a little more expensive here in seoul. we were also charged for checking in early (50%) at around 6am. the hotel is also connected to a department store and duty free shop that sells high-end items. if you are a traveler with a good budget, this is the place for you.", 'Hotel is linked to the mall and tube.', 'Great. except that the gym was under renovation which was a bit of a shame coz there were only 3 threadmills which meant i had to wait. but apart from that it was great. i didnt have to walk out in the cold to get to the tube', 'location is very good.', 'Hotel charged me an additional fee when I checked in together with my husband, they gave me the reason was that I made a reservation for one person.', 'central location, good service', 'recommendable hotel, acceptable price for the category. breakfast price completely overdone,.', 'Great Service', 'Great hotel and centrally located, staff were very nice and accommodating, Shopping and restaurants within easy walking distance.', 'Excellent location', 'Nice hotel, with clean and spacious room. Service was great always with a smile. Hotel is well located and many bars, restaurants and shopping within walking distance. Duty Free, Supermarket and Food Court all linked to the hotel. The airport shuttle conveniently stops in front of the hotel. Would certainly stay at the Lotte again.', 'Good location with amenities, great service from hotel staff, no language barrier for english speaking tourist', 'I came with my spouse and 6 years old daughter without a planned itinerary. Just wanted a free and easy and relax holiday. And this was made possible with my choice of hotel, Lotte Hotel Seoul. Transportation from hotel to airport and around the city is easily accessible. The hotel basement is link to one of the subway entry, shopping mall, and grocery mart and food court. Staffs are friendly and greet you all the time, giving you a warm feeling. The room is clean and cozy. The help desk staff are always smiling and readily to answer your queries. They speak good English and provide very good recommendations and clear directions. I am totally impressed with them all especially this staff. She was a great help to me in ensuring my family had a good holiday time in Seoul. The only regret is that the gym and swimming pool is under renovation although a temporary gym is setup.', 'Hotel decorations and ambience', 'this hotel is so beautifully decorated. very luxury and stylish. friendly and helpful staff. very near to subway and attached to mall.', 'The service was great: very courteous and considerate, service with smiles and personal care! great location; spacious rooms with grand interiors!', 'We were treated like Royalty! The airport transfer was on time, they arranged the check-in process for us (due to our late arrival: flight schedule, not their fault) and we were whisked away to our room instantly! The service was exceptional, the rooms were grand and spacious and the location of the hotel was great! Close to the fashion district and cultural landmarks! We will stay at this hotel again and again!', 'located in the heart of myeongdong', "compared to lotte city hotel, mapo, this hotel is obviously different in terms of service, and location. staffs here are so much more welcoming than the one in mapo. the location is very well located. lotte department store, is just right under the hotel with all good foods! however, the only thing that i don't like about this hotel is its room size...too small", 'The service staffs are great! Regardless of the housekeeping or the conceige. They provide five stars service!', "I booked this hotel at the last minute before I travel. I do not have much ideal on the hotel. Only after I have checked in, I begin to love the hotel! First of all, it is very convenient. It's right above the subway green line. There is escalator to the ground floor of the hotel from the subway station which you can hardly find such convenience with other hotels in Seoul. Secondly, we are impressed by the super high speed WIFI in the room. We do not need to ask for password, once you enter your room, you are conneted to their WIFI! Lastly, their services are excellent too. There was one night, we decided to have our dinner in our room. We called the housekeeping to provide us 2 sets of cutlery. Based pn my pass experience, I usually need to call at least twice before the housekeeping bring the things to our room. However, this time I needed only one call and the cutlery are brought to our room after 5 mins! Efficient! Also, the conceige has been very helpful too. We asked them to recommend a good restaurant that serve korean cuisine, they do not just recommend what their has, they recommended the real well known ones in Seoul.", 'Location, room amenities, considerate check-in staff, complimentary fruits and wine', 'stayed at this hotel from oct 21-23. i agree with previous reviews that the room given to me is quite small compared to other hotels with the same star level and nightly rates. however, i must say that the amenities in the room are complete and very nice. the bed and pillows and comforters are very comfortable. the push button remote control for the lights, temp, clock alarm is very innovative. the location of the hotel is very strategic since it is connected to a very big mall (lotte mall), to the duty free shop, it is very close to a subway station and most of all, it is a few steps away from myeongdong shopping area. there are a number of tourist spots that can also be accessed from the hotel. since the weather is very nice at this time in seoul, it is okay to walk from lotte to nandaemun, city hall, myeongdong cathedral. the hotel staff are also very courteous and approachable. we also arrived early morning and the check-in crew was very considerate to let us check in at 11am despite the official check-in time is actually at 2pm. their concierge service is also very helpful in giving us directions to the places that we wanted to go to, showing us in the map our route, very accurate in providing taxi fare rates and very knowledgeable with regards schedules of some tourist spots (example, they told us that gyeokbokgong palace is closed during tuesdays, so it saved us time going there). on our second night, we highly appreciate that coming from a shopping activity, we returned to our room to find that they left a bottle of wine and some fruits as compliments. the hotel is also clean despite many people coming in and out of the hotel during our stay since there was a convention. also, the hotel was gracious enough to lend umbrellas to all guests one morning when it rained. i would say that i highly recommend this hotel and i would definitely choose it again when i go back to seoul. despite the relatively high cost, you actually get very good value for your mo', 'Super convenient; 5 mins to Meongdong, and right above train station', "Nothing special about this hotel except the great location. It's clean but I'd expect more for the price.", 'locations', 'The hotel is pretty central and directly link to Lotte shopping mall, Myeongdong shopping districts and also the metro.', 'Room is really nice and clean', 'This hotel is really really comfortable and the staff are really friendly and nice. They speak good English too which is really useful for us. They even have a information desk there where you can ask about anything regarding Seoul. The rooms are also very nice and comfortable. The bathroom is also huge. Myeongdong is just across the street and is really convenient.', 'new wing lobby', 'the hotel is very nice.closed from shopping mall area and having larger room but the gym facility should be improved.', 'Just opposite Myeong Dong', 'Very good location, just next to Lotte department store and opposite of Myeong dong. Hotel\'s staff very nice and helpful, hotel room very clean and tidy. "New wing" is not as new as the main building, it is a little bit misleading..... Most of the hotel facilities were located at main building, so i suggest to book the main building if possible.', 'Great location, fantastic staff, room was really comfortable', 'This place was expensive but it was well worth the price. The room was filled with cool gadgets, the staff was very professional and friendly, and the location was great. We could not have asked for more.', 'Very upmarket', 'The hotel staff are so attentive and will see to all your needs. The hotel itself was clean and well presented. The concierg bent over backwards to help us when were going out shoping and told us the best places to visit.', 'Location and direct connection to Incheon', '3 nights stay in Lotte, the room is too small that my the chair for the working table can barely fit the room, making me sitting very uncomfortable when working on the table since I cannot further move by chair back.', 'Next to Lotte Department Store and Myeong-dong street shopping', "Generally a pleasant stay and wonderful front line staff. It is a busy hotel with lots of tourists and business functions. OK, if you don't mind a bit of buzz. I checked in late and yet was given a room next door to renovations. I was awaken by knocks on the wall before 8am - typically would be up but I flew in on a red eye earlier in the day. It was only for a few short minutes but I was awake by then. Wondering if they could have done that later in the day if they only needed to do a few minutes of hacking.", 'Convenient Location for shopping and sightseeing', "There's a food court and lotte department store within the hotel building. But there are also lots of dining choice nearby the hotel. There's also a subway station nearby so its easy to get to anywhere. Hotel staff was friendly, and gives you the feeling that they are willing to help answering all your needs. The room do seems abit small for the price you pay though.", 'location was wonderful and easy excess to everything', 'highly recommend to first time traveller to seoul, korea.if you love to shop than this is best hotel', 'Superb service from hotel staff.', 'Lovely hotel with good service from all staff. We are able to communicate with the staff in english and mandarin. Hotel location is great just across the street from the restaurants at Myeong Dong. Hotel is clean and comfortable with a nice bathroom. Room size is quite small though.', 'The hotel location is quite convenient with the subway, Lotte Department Store next to it. I had four nights (Deluxe Double) in New Wing of the hotel, the room was a good size with a great view over central Seoul, but with a bit out-dated decoration. Check in was quick and efficient. The bathroom was well equipped with a great, separate shower but seems old and the toiletries are provided by Molton Brown.', 'Close to subway, walking distance to many sites and areas, adjacent to Lotte department store, lovely bar in lobby', 'we had a room on the club floor in the new wing with a spectacular view of namsan tower. the room was large and comfortable the offerings in the club lounge were excellent, breakfast choices ranging from freshly made omelettes to cereal fruit and yogurts, with cocktails and snacks in the afternoon/ evening. the staff was friendly and helpful.. a call to housekeeping for extra towels was answered and delivered promptly. the concierge service in main lobby was helpful in booking some dinner reservations. we did eat dinner in the japanese restaurant in hotel one night and that would be our only negative, it was seriously overpriced and not at all quality. our only other negative observation was that the carpet in our room was slightly soiled and could have used a cleaning. although we were told prior to arrival that the gym facility was being renovated and would not be available there was a temporary gym set up on another floor which my husband used and said was quite nice. more seating in the lobby would have been nice. overall we had a very enjoyable stay at lotte and would stay there again', 'next to myondong', 'this hotel is located at the best location where is closed to myondong and tax free store. we did not have any good view even if it was 25f. gym has been under renovation.', 'Great location, friendly staff, nice views from room', 'The Lotte hotel in Seoul is a top shelf hotel. Located in down town Seoul it is near lots of a attractions and within walking of the city tour bus. Staff are friendly and professional. The rooms are well appointed but small. They even provide a mobile phone for guests to use. Its much cheaper to eat at one of the local eateries than the hotel.', 'Location amd froendly staff', 'Enjoying staying at this hotel. Its located within easy reach of many attractions', 'Staff very polite, almost too much. Very convenient location. Close to subway station, next to Lotte dept. store.t. Check out the food court in basement level in the super market of this store. Good foods, lots to look, fun place and inexpensive meals.', 'The Superior twin room was way too small. The staff was very polite. But when asked questions, they were not very helpful. They were either unwilling or unable to assist with short and negative answers. The location was very convenient for us. We could walk or use the train.', 'super easy to get around and great service', 'very convenient location, good restaurants around the hotel, very accessible!', 'location', '"Lovely hotel and service with a smile" or "Great location but small rooms"Lovely hotel and service with a smile" or "Great location but small rooms"Lovely hotel and service with a smile" or "Great location but small rooms"Lovely hotel and service with a smile" or "Great location but small rooms"Lovely hotel and service with a smile" or "Great location but small rooms"', 'Attached to Lotte Dept store and direct access to Eujiro 1 MRT station', 'No need to get out for shopping as hotel is in same shopping complex as dept store. Very convenient for supermarket shopping in the Premium supermarket. Lots of fresh fruits Room Has a lounge chair / bed that can comfortably sleep another adult for a night Italian restaurant in the hotel was good but the 3 Michelin stars French restaurant is over rated', 'Location', 'Nice hotel, but very small rooms, good location and near subway', 'perfect location,friendly staffs,the facilities are new', 'I stayed at ritz calton and Lotte world hotel respectively during the first two days but they all disappointed me by the old facilities. Then we went to Lotte Seoul hotel and asked for a look at the room.Almost immediately I booked for two nights here coz I was satisfied by the king size bed,newly decoration of the room. and it is at the perfect location which is right next to Lotte young plaza and meoungdong.I will definitely stay at this hotel when I go to Seoul again.', 'Good location. Large room.', 'To be honest, there are not too many disadvantages against this hotel. Large room compared to other hotel in the same area, and the price is very reasonable. Walking distance from Myeong-dong area, and there’s a subway exit just in front of the hotel. Not mention Lotte Duty Free and Lotte Department Store just around the corner. They also offer free shuttle to Lotte World, so it’s quite convenient. If I need to list something I don’t like, maybe wi-fi is kind of slow at night (I guess too many guests would be online at that time) so might not be the best choice for business visitors; also I’d like to see more seats for waiting in lobby.', 'good location', 'Good Services with Good location and value for money', 'shoping', "The hotel was excellent in shoping, business meeting and relative family meeting. I had two relative meeting in the Korean goumet restaurent. Everybody liked it. It is located in the center of the government office building. It is very convenient location to make an appointment in business. A big and luxuary department store named Lotte is there. My faily and I enjoyed shoping and eating in the food court of the department store. I really enjoyed traveling and staying in the hotel. I'd like recommend the hotel to travllers who want to visit South Korea.", 'Good location for shopping', 'Well furnished room & excellent location for shopping and easily accessed by sub-way. Services from Staffs both at counters & entrance to lobby areas are all consistently good since my previous stays 20 years ago.', 'Very comfortable bed set, nice toilet, great hotel staff', "we spent our honeymoon there. room was well renovated and very clean. size was ok although a bit smaller than we expected. toilet is big and nice. walking distance to myeongdong and underground shopping arcade. easy to take subway (2-3 lines) to elsewhere. very good location! hotel staff were all very friendly and tried their very best to help you. although sometimes you may find housekeeping ladies do not speak english at all, but it won't bother you that much. i don't mind staying in this hotel again.", 'good location', 'the location is really convenient. room condition is also very good. a little expensive in the rate but worth the stay.', 'Great Location, friendly staff', 'We been staying in Lotte Seoul Hotel for 4 nights . This is a very nice hotel with great location which is walking distance to most of the attraction. The hotel is attach with a duty free shop and shopping mall which is very convenience .', 'good location', 'We booked a "club" room in this hotel and were not sorry. The breakfast in the lounge, normally a mediocre affair, was very good and complete. Evening cocktail hour was excellent. Considering the price of wine in Seoul, it is definitely worth investing in the “club” room. The Hotel scores on all fronts. Rooms are large, well maintained and luxurious decorated. Staff, without exception, go out of the way to make your life pleasant and especially the concierge was a great and patient help in setting up our excursion schedule. Restaurants serve great food. So it all works and some might say it should because of the price of the room. But then there is still the biggest attraction of this hotel, its location. Almost all Seoul’s attraction and sights are within walking distance and if not the underground station is connected to the hotel. A great time saver in a busy place like Seoul. Definitely consider staying there.', 'best location for shopping', 'We never been to Seoul and had many hotels to choose from. Glad we choose Lotte, very clean and accomodating. The gym was under rennovations but that was okay because there was plenty of exercise shopping', 'the hotel has a shopping mall inside', 'i really like this hotel because it has a really great view from my room. i can see a mountain in the middle of the building, also lotte hotel in myeongdong is close too many places to shop. In addition, there is also a shopping mall inside the hotel so it is easier to find what i need inside. The restaurant also taste really good and delicious. It also has a very good and nice service towards the costumer. Overall, i am statisfied with this hotel.', 'very convenient location - walking distance to many happening places, shopping, eatery, palace, etc. well-maintained guest room, good concierge service, very good singer performs in the lobby lounge in the evening.', "i have enjoyed my 2-nights' stay here. many pros as mentioned above, 5-star experience mostly. there was one con - the noise coming from floor cleaning outside the guestroom - i get good sleep only if i get up early, otherwise they start vaccum clean (very noisy) and loud chatting even before 9am...can hear clearly in guestroom and hard to get quiet good rest throughout the day.", 'Excellent facilities, nearby shopping area, close to subway', 'It is always a pleasant stay in Lotte Hotel. Most hotel staff can speak english, its very good.... Especially for the first timer to Korea, this is a best play to stay.....you can get lost outside if you dont know where to go since most of them can not speak english, nor the taxi driver..... Myeong dong the most desired shopping district just crossing the block of complex so if you wanna stroll around shopping till midnight you just walk... By the way, I got a complimentary fruit plate and fine bottle of wine.', 'location, nice rooms, clean, and service', "i have a four night stay at this hotel with my 4 years old and my wife, the service was pretty good. the hotel is nice, definitely a 5 star property, it is connected to a shopping mall and a duty free store on the 10th floor, so shopping is very convenience. the airport bus stops right in front of the hotel, so getting to and from the airport is easy. subway station is 5 minutes away, and it is right in the heart of the myeongdon shopping district, so more shopping if you want. there is a free shuttle bus going to the lotte world hotel, which has an amusement park next to it, so it is a nice feature for my kid. keep in the mind the last shuttle is at 7pm, so keep track of your time. the shuttle also stops by itaewon district, which is another nice area for western style food and bar. itaewon is full of people, even at 2:00am, and food is good. taking the taxi back to the hotel is not expensive either. overall, i would stay in the hotel again. the room is small, not even a place to lay my luggage flat down, so don't carry too much. during my stay, the internet was a problem, there were times that i cannot get access at all. internet was free, but it is only good when it works.", 'location', "we booked deluxe room type in new wing, the staff is very nice and helpful, but the room is very old... we thought new wing should be newer, but actually it's not. It's great that we get the extra space/service for the same price. The staff are always ready to help us with a smile.
